body: Sulis are defined by class levels—they do not possess racial Hit Dice. Sulis have the following racial traits.
name: Suli

sections.body: Sulis tend to be strong and charming, but slow-witted.
sections.name: +2 Strength, +2 Charisma, -2 Intelligence

sections.body: Sulis can see twice as far as humans in dim light.
sections.name: Low-Light Vision

sections.body: Sulis are keen negotiators, and gain a +2 racial bonus on Diplomacy and Sense Motive checks.
sections.name: Negotiator

sections.body: Sulis have resistance to acid 5, cold 5, electricity 5, and fire 5.
sections.name: Elemental Resistance

sections.body: Sulis begin play speaking Common and any one elemental language of their choice (Aquan, Auran, Ignan, or Terran). Sulis with high Intelligence scores can choose from among the following bonus languages: Aquan, Auran, Draconic, Ignan, and Terran.
sections.name: Languages
